title: Run Jetha Run: The Chappal Chase
description: Bapuji is Angry! Dodge obstacles and run through the Gokuldham society.

title: Bhide's Sakharam Rush
description: Help Atmaram Tukaram Bhide deliver his famous Madhavi's Achar & Papad on time!

title: Bhide's Discipline Master: Gokuldham Patrol
description: Take charge as the 'Ekmeva Secretary' Bhide. Stop Tapu from breaking windows!

title: Badminton with Babita
description: Join the iconic character Babita Ji from "Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah" (TMKOC) in an exhilarating badminton adventure like never before. In "Badminton With Babita" you are at the center stage, controlling Babita Ji herself as she embarks on an exciting journey to become the badminton champion of Gokuldham Society!

title: Gokuldham Holi Mahotsav
description: Get ready for a splash-filled Holi adventure with your favorite Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah characters! Choose colorful pichkaris and vibrant backgrounds, then knock opponents into the water to unlock new gear and characters. Whether you're a fan of the show or just love a lively water fight, this game promises nonstop fun!

title: Jethalal Kite Flying
description: Get ready to take to the skies with Jethalal Champaklal Gada from "Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah" (TMKOC) in "Jethalal's Kite Flying " Join Jethalal in a thrilling kite-flying adventure where you'll navigate the colorful skies of Gokuldham Society, cut opponents' kites, and aim to be the ultimate kite-flying champion.
